Hi Thomas,

I noticed there is no mention of supporing the curs feature... Is that going to be included as well or no? I really hope so...

(For a number of reasons I want to avoid VOLT, including the fact that I like programming the feature file directly and want to use ps curves, not ttf. I eagerly await when FL can handle these features!).

Best wishes  
Idris
